title: AnastasiaDate Releases Thrilling Road Recap of its Amazing Gumball 3000 Rally Spectacular
text: AnastasiaDate Releases Thrilling Road Recap of its Amazing Gumball 3000 Rally Spectacular September 24, 2015 -- AnastasiaDate has released a thrilling video capturing the exciting times of its Gumball 3000 adventure from Stockholm to Las Vegas. AnastasiaDate has just released a high-quality road video that brilliantly captures its entire Gumball 3000 adventure from start to finish. The leading online dating service, a participant and sponsor of the Gumball 3000 Rally 2015, was a popular contestant at this years iconic rally, grabbing major media and audience attention right through the 3000-mile drive, which underwent several major stages. AnastasiaDates video, uploaded to their official YouTube channel, has already attracted a large number of hits. Members and fans are keen to see how the action unfolded right through the long and exciting journey. The Gumball 3000 Rally was flagged off from Stockholm on May 23 rd , 2015. Cars crossed the finishing line in Las Vegas on May 30 th after passing through Oslo, Copenhagen, Amsterdam, then flying across the Atlantic Ocean to Reno, and continuing on to San Francisco and Los Angeles. The AnastasiaDate video captures the adventure and excitement of this famous journey throughout the rally. The breathtaking wrap-up of the entire Gumball 3000 Rally 2015 journey has brilliantly captured the adventurous spirit of the two awesome members who steered the 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Z/28. They showed real spirit in the face of tough challenges on the journey despite their relative inexperience. The sprightly AnastasiaDate members had the spotlight firmly focused on them and their dazzling car right through the event. AnastasiaDate and the Gumball 3000 Rally have a lot in common. Both are known for creating an ambitious and aspiration-rich lifestyle, topped with an attitude that challenges convention. AnastasiaDate is acknowledged by members as one of the best international online dating services offering a secure and vibrant platform for singles all over the world. Members can meet, communicate and establish exciting and interesting online relationships. Members can start their own romantic journey on AnastasiaDate, which may even promise to be as exciting and adventurous as the Gumball 3000 Rally. All singles can make use of features like CamShare and Chat to communicate with compatible partners. For more information, visit www.AnastasiaDate.com About AnastasiaDate: AnastasiaDate is the leading international dating service that facilitates exciting and romantic companionship between men and women all over the world. Founded in 1993, AnastasiaDate now has over 20 million international users and attracts more than 80 million visitors annually. Additionally, over 1.5 million conversations are exchanged onsite daily. AnastasiaDate is committed to member safety, customer satisfaction and the ongoing pursuit of innovation. Part of the Social Discovery Ventures network, AnastasiaDate is headquartered in New York with additional representation in every country it touches, providing a high level of customer service to a worldwide clientele. All members are able to communicate across a variety of top-notch multimedia platforms, including video chat and a mobile app for Android devices available in Google Play. Media Contact
